title: Terms Simplification
description: We turn complex Bitcoin lingo into plain, everyday language. If you can explain it to a friend over coffee, to a 9 year old, or to a grandpa,  you’ll find it here.

title: Illustrations
description: We pair clear definitions with simple illustrations to make learning intuitive. Because sometimes, a sketch does what a paragraph can’t; it bridges the gap between confusion and clarity.

title: Open Source
description: Add your own plain-language definitions, suggest edits, share feedback, or upload visuals. Every contribution makes Bitcoin clearer for someone else. Bit by bit, together, we build understanding.
